import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Game } from 'src/app/models/game.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-games-list', templateUrl: './games-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./games-list.component.css'] }) export class GamesListComponent implements OnInit{ games: Game[] = []; constructor() { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
